Name.label: Infantile cerebral and cerebellar atrophy with postnatal progressive microcephaly
Syndrome with microcephaly as major feature

TextSection.Contents: Infantile cerebral and cerebellar atrophy with postnatal progressive microcephaly is a rare, central nervous system malformation syndrome characterized by progressive microcephaly with profound motor delay and intellectual disability, associated with hypertonia, spasticity, clonus, and seizures, with brain imaging revealing severe cerebral and cerebellar atrophy, and poor myelination.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
